comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when there are no members to show on an empty screen. It appears as a centered text in the "No Contacts Item" component, providing users with guidance on what they can see.

usage.context:
<Text className="no-item-text" textAlign="center">
 {isGuests
 ? t("InfoPanel:GuestsEmptyScreenText")
 : isGroups
 ? t("InfoPanel:GroupsEmptyScreenText")
 : t("InfoPanel:MembersEmptyScreenText")}
 </Text>
 </StyledNoItemContainer>
 );
 };

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Üzvlərin məlumatlarına burada baxın' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would be closer to 'Burada üzvlərin məlumatlarını görə bilərsiniz' or 'Üzvlərin məlumatları burada yerləşdirilib'.
The translation is overly verbose and not idiomatic for a button/link text. "をクリックしてご覧ください" (click here to see) is clunky and not how a native speaker would phrase it for this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: メンバー詳細はこちら

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a full sentence with punctuation, which might not be ideal for a compact UI element like a button or link. A shorter, more concise phrase is preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: メンバー詳細はこちら

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'members' is translated as 'hóspedes', which means 'guests'. 'Members' refers to people who are part of a group or organization, not necessarily guests.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more accurate translation like 'Veja os detalhes dos membros aqui' or 'Consulte os detalhes dos participantes aqui'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Detaliile membrilor aici' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Vezi detaliile membrilor' or 'Aici găsești detalii despre membri'.

The translation "Здесь будут представлены подробности об участниках" is a bit too formal for a screen displaying an empty state. It implies a future action rather than describing the current state. The English 'See members details here' is simpler and more direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more direct translation like "Здесь будут участники" or "Здесь появятся участники" (Here will be members/Here members will appear), or "Пока здесь нет участников" (Currently there are no members here).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙසේ සාමාජික විස්තර බලන්න:' is a literal translation that doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of "See members details here." A more natural Sinhala phrasing would be more appropriate. 'මෙසේ' (mese) means 'this way' which is not the intended meaning in the context of an empty list.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like ' සාමාජිකයන් මෙහි ඇතිවන විට බලන්න' (Samaajikayan meh eathi wethawa danne watune bailanna) - meaning 'See details when members are available here'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tu nájdete podrobnosti o členoch' is a literal translation, but it doesn't convey the same meaning as 'See members details here'. It sounds more formal and less inviting. A more natural and user-friendly translation would be something like 'Pozrite si detaily členov' or 'Zobraziť detaily členov'.
